message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to make a smart investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Thanks for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $8,000?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $10,000. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
